Package MVC

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • MVC.GameController
  • public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
    The GameController class handles the game logic and user interactions for the Battleship game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GameController​(GameModel model, GameView view)
      Constructs a GameController object with the specified GameModel and GameView.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void attachButtonListeners()
      Attaches button listeners to the grid buttons.
      void computerMakeMove()
      Makes a move for the computer opponent.
      void handleCellClicked​(int boardIndex, int row, int col)
      Handles the event when a cell is clicked on the grid.
      void resetGame()
      Resets the game by redrawing the board and attaching button listeners.
      void setBoatSizeAndDirection​(java.lang.Integer size, java.lang.String direction)
      Sets the boat size and direction for the player's move.
      void showInstructions()
      Shows the game instructions.
      void updatePlayer()
      Updates the player's grid colors based on the current game model.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • GameController

        public GameController​(GameModel model,
                      GameView view)
        Constructs a GameController object with the specified GameModel and GameView.
        Parameters:
        model - The GameModel object representing the game model.
        view - The GameView object representing the game view.

    • Method Detail

      • attachButtonListeners

        public void attachButtonListeners()
        Attaches button listeners to the grid buttons.

      • handleCellClicked

        public void handleCellClicked​(int boardIndex,
                              int row,
                              int col)
        Handles the event when a cell is clicked on the grid.
        Parameters:
        boardIndex - The index of the board (player's or opponent's).
        row - The row index of the clicked cell.
        col - The column index of the clicked cell.

      • setBoatSizeAndDirection

        public void setBoatSizeAndDirection​(java.lang.Integer size,
                                    java.lang.String direction)
        Sets the boat size and direction for the player's move.
        Parameters:
        size - The size of the boat.
        direction - The direction of the boat.

      • resetGame

        public void resetGame()
        Resets the game by redrawing the board and attaching button listeners.

      • showInstructions

        public void showInstructions()
        Shows the game instructions.

      • updatePlayer

        public void updatePlayer()
        Updates the player's grid colors based on the current game model.

      • computerMakeMove

        public void computerMakeMove()
        Makes a move for the computer opponent.
